AccountActivation.Subject: DHI WaterData - Signup
AccountActivation.Body:
Hi {0}, just one more step!

We just need to verify your email address to complete your DHI WaterData signup.

Verify Your Email

Please note that this link will expire in 1 day.

If you have not signed up for DHI WaterData, please ignore this email.

PasswordReset.Body:
Hi {0},

We got a request to reset the password for your DHI WaterData account.

Reset Password

Please note that this link will expire in 1 day.

If you ignore this message, your password will not be changed. If you have not signed up for DHI WaterData, please ignore this email.

The DHI WaterData team
